Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: K2 is Orn. The structure consists of a cyclic peptide lactone formed between the phenolic -OH of Tyr3 and the C-terminal -COOH of an amino acid at position 10. The N-terminus of the decapeptide segment is acylated with a beta-hydroxy fatty acid (beta-OH FA).
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Lipopeptides from the banyan endophyte, Bacillus subtilis K1 mass spectrometric characterization of a library of fengycins.
Literature.Reference: J Am Soc Mass Spectrom. 2012 Oct;23(10)1716-28. Epub 2012 Jul 31.
Literature.Author: Pathak KV, Keharia H, Gupta K, Thakur SS, Balaram P.
